cz.cvut.fel.kinclma1.player

Interface PlayerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TestListener, TestListener1

    public interface PlayerListener
    An event listener to a MusicStringPlayer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the listener, when its associated player gets closed
      void setPlayer(MusicStringPlayer player)
      Sets player to send commands to
      void setPlaying(boolean playing)
      Sets the current playing state of the player (playing/paused) to the listener
      void setPosition(int position)
      Sets the current player position in the song to the listener
      void setSongLength(int length)
      Sets song length in the listener, only for initialization purposes

    • Method Detail

      • setPlayer

        void setPlayer(MusicStringPlayer player)
        Sets player to send commands to
        Parameters:
        player - controlled MusicStringPlayer instance

      • setSongLength

        void setSongLength(int length)
        Sets song length in the listener, only for initialization purposes
        Parameters:
        length - length of the song in seconds

      • setPlaying

        void setPlaying(boolean playing)
        Sets the current playing state of the player (playing/paused) to the listener
        Parameters:
        playing - state of playback true = player is playing, false = player is paused

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(int position)
        Sets the current player position in the song to the listener
        Parameters:
        position - current playback position in seconds

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the listener, when its associated player gets closed
